title: Welcome to SpaceLogic!
description1: At SpaceLogic, we help simplify your architectural projects. This online platform is designed to support architects and their clients by streamlining communication on all aspects of the project.
description2: Join our community now and take advantage of the platform that will transform the way you manage projects!

security.title: A secure platform for your architectural projects
security.desc: We prioritize the security of your data.

simplicity.title: A simple environment to easily find projects by organization
simplicity.desc: An intuitive interface designed for team productivity.

history.title: Access to change history
history.desc: Track and review every modification made to your projects.

subscription.title: Subscription plans tailored to your needs
subscription.desc: Flexible pricing options based on your usage.

comments.title: Spaces for client feedback on each aspect of the project
comments.desc: Collaborate and communicate effectively with clients.

why1: Practical tools to optimize your work
aboutText: We are a team of four undergraduate computer science students from Université Laval.
